trans-unit.source: Log into <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Web Restore in Batch Mode

seg-source.mrk: Log into <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Web Restore in Batch Mode

target.mrk: Se connecter à la restauration web <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode batch

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> allows you to perform a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> as an administrator using the batch mode. This can be useful to restore files from a group of agents within a tenant. To perform a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> in batch mode, you need a password.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> allows you to perform a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> as an administrator using the batch mode.
This can be useful to restore files from a group of agents within a tenant.
To perform a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> in batch mode, you need a password.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> vous permet d'effectuer une <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> en tant qu'administrateur en utilisant le mode batch.
Cela peut être utile pour restaurer des fichiers à partir de n'importe quel groupe d'agent dans une entité.
Pour effectuer un <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> en mode batch, vous avez besoin d'un mot de passe.

trans-unit.source: To access a tenant, you need a dedicated password. Make sure the tenant is logged in to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> when connecting to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> application. See <MadCap:xref href="Log into_Web_Restore_Administrator.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Connecting to Lina Web Restore as Administrator</MadCap:xref> for more details.

seg-source.mrk: To access a tenant, you need a dedicated password.

Make sure the tenant is logged in to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> when connecting to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> application.

See <MadCap:xref href="Log into_Web_Restore_Administrator.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Connecting to Lina Web Restore as Administrator</MadCap:xref> for more details.

target.mrk: Pour accéder à une entité, vous avez besoin d'un jeton de restauration dédié.

Assurez-vous que l'entité est connectée à la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> lors de la connexion à l'application de <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

Voir la <MadCap:xref href="Log into_Web_Restore_Administrator.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Connecting to Lina Web Restore as Administrator</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: In your browser, enter the following URL:

seg-source.mrk: In your browser, enter the following URL:

target.mrk: Dans votre navigateur, entrez l'URL suivante :

trans-unit.source: http://:8181/webrestore/batch if you are on a secure local network.

seg-source.mrk: http://:8181/webrestore/batch if you are on a secure local network.

target.mrk: http://:8181/webrestore/admin si vous êtes sur un réseau local sécurisé.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the by selecting Restore > Web Restore > Web Restore batch.

seg-source.mrk: You can also use the by selecting Restore > Web Restore > Web Restore batch.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez également utiliser la en sélectionnant Restauration > Restauration Web > Restauration Web batch.

trans-unit.source: Create a restore token. For more details, see <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Token</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more details, see <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Token</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Pour plus de détails, voir <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Token</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Select Login to access the application.

seg-source.mrk: Select Login to access the application.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez Login pour accéder à l'application .
